verses.name: Psalms 119:122
verses.text: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.

verses.name: Psalms 119:123
verses.text: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 119:124
verses.text: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.

verses.name: Psalms 119:125
verses.text: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.

verses.name: Psalms 119:126
verses.text: It is time for thee, Lord, to work: for they have made void thy law.

verses.name: Psalms 119:127
verses.text: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.

verses.name: Psalms 119:128
verses.text: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.
